oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Words and sentences given by Griet, Piet and Jantje to Isabella Lloyd. y/80', 2) A word list from Jantje is included on pp.43 opp-44 opp, 3) p.54 opp: note: 'corrected from here to ddoe incl. Jany/80', 4) p.87: (Nov. 17 1879) there is a translated block of text on this page, about the horse who eats from a sack and the fowl who picks up the food from the ground, 5) This story is found in Book Kora I-4.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd Kora notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences
